scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix common
scripts.build: npm --prefix frontend run build && npm --prefix backend run build
scripts.generate:types:local: npx supabase gen types typescript --local > common/supabase.types.ts
scripts.generate:types: npx supabase gen types typescript --project-id rcbddkhvysexkvgqpcud > common/supabase.types.ts
scripts.s:link:prod: npx @dotenvx/dotenvx run -f supabase/.env.production -- npx supabase link --project-ref rcbddkhvysexkvgqpcud
scripts.s:link:dev: npx @dotenvx/dotenvx run -f supabase/.env.preview -- npx supabase link --project-ref kpqrzaisoyxqillzpbms
scripts.s:local:diff: env-cmd -f .env.supabase.local npx supabase db diff --schema public
scripts.s:diff:linked: env-cmd -f .env.supabase.local npx supabase db diff --schema public --linked
scripts.s:diff:linked:f: npx supabase db diff --schema public --linked -f latest_diff
scripts.s:restart: env-cmd -f .env.supabase.local npx supabase stop && env-cmd -f .env.supabase.local npx supabase start
scripts.s:reset:infisical: infisical run --env=dev -- npx supabase db reset
scripts.s:config:push:prod: npx @dotenvx/dotenvx run -f supabase/.env.production -- npx supabase config push
scripts.s:db:push:prod: npx @dotenvx/dotenvx run -f supabase/.env.production -- npx supabase db push
scripts.s:db:push:preview: npx @dotenvx/dotenvx run -f supabase/.env.preview -- npx supabase db push
scripts.s:config:push:preview: npx @dotenvx/dotenvx run -f supabase/.env.preview -- npx supabase config push
scripts.s:seed:main: npx @dotenvx/dotenvx run -f .env.local -- npx supabase db dump --data-only -s auth,public -f supabase/seed.sql
scripts.s:seed:dev: npx @dotenvx/dotenvx run -f .env.supabase.local -- npx supabase db dump --data-only -s auth,public -f supabase/seed.sql
scripts.infisical:sync:local:env: infisical export --env=staging --format=dotenv > .env.local.recovered && echo 'âœ… Local environment synced to .env.local.recovered'
scripts.infisical:sync:supabase:local: infisical export --env=dev --format=dotenv > .env.supabase.local.recovered && echo 'âœ… Supabase local environment synced to .env.supabase.local.recovered'
scripts.infisical:sync:both: npm run infisical:sync:local:env && npm run infisical:sync:supabase:local && echo 'ðŸŽ‰ Both environment files synced! Check .env.local.recovered and .env.supabase.local.recovered'
scripts.infisical:push:local:env: infisical secrets set --file=.env.local --env=staging && echo 'âœ… Local environment (.env.local) pushed to staging'
scripts.infisical:push:supabase:local: infisical secrets set --file=.env.supabase.local --env=dev && echo 'âœ… Supabase local environment pushed to dev'
scripts.infisical:push:both: npm run infisical:push:local:env && npm run infisical:push:supabase:local && echo 'ðŸŽ‰ Both environment files pushed to Infisical!'
scripts.infisical:sync:dev: infisical export --env=dev --format=dotenv > .env.local.infisical && echo 'âœ… Dev environment synced to .env.local.infisical'
scripts.infisical:sync:staging: infisical export --env=staging --format=dotenv > .env.staging.infisical && echo 'âœ… Staging environment synced to .env.staging.infisical'
scripts.infisical:sync:prod: infisical export --env=prod --format=dotenv > .env.prod.infisical && echo 'âœ… Production environment synced to .env.prod.infisical'
scripts.infisical:sync:all: npm run infisical:sync:dev && npm run infisical:sync:staging && npm run infisical:sync:prod
scripts.infisical:copy:dev: npm run infisical:sync:dev && cp .env.local.infisical .env.local && echo 'âœ… Dev environment copied to .env.local'
scripts.dev:local: env-cmd -f .env.supabase.local concurrently "npm run s:start" "npm run frontend" "npm run backend"
scripts.dev:live: env-cmd -f .env.local concurrently "npm run frontend" "npm run backend"
scripts.frontend:infisical: infisical run --env=dev -- npm --prefix frontend run dev
scripts.backend:infisical: infisical run --env=dev -- npm --prefix backend run start:watch
scripts.check-translation:strict: cd frontend && npx tsx src/scripts/check-translations.ts strict
